General.Name: Pili International Multimedia Co Ltd
General.Description: Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. produces and distributes dramas, TV shows, video tapes, and movies in Taiwan. The company also engages in supply of satellite radio and television programs; sales and authorization of peripheral goods and licensing; and production and distribution of drama series, TV programs, DVDs, monthly magazines, merchandise sales, and other related products. The company was formerly known as Da Chih Entertainment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. in August 2000. Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 95, xintai 5th road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221416
